import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Loader from "react-loader-spinner"; import ApiRequest from "src/Api/Data/requestApi"; import './_.css'; const Profile = ({category,existingCategories,back,id,DisableUser,BlockUserPermanet,username,checkeds})=>{ const [Details,setDetails]=useState([]); const [status,setStatus] = useState(); const [save,setSave] = useState(true); const LoadUserData=async (id)=>{ setSave(true); const result = await ApiRequest.getUserDetails(id); setDetails(result.data); console.log(result.data) setSave(false); } useEffect(()=>{ LoadUserData(id); },[]); return <> {!save &&
